column5: Looking at going to trout lake towards the end of the month. Might stay at boois resort does anyone have any info on how fishing is this time of year? Want to fish walleye, pike, and lake troutany pointers would be great maybe acouple fishing spots. also if anyone has anyother suggestions on a great fall trip in nw ontario let me know. either a fly in ,boat in or a drive in thats along ways from a major roadthank you
